arguments.description: You can quickly enter a simple GETPIVOTDATA formula by typing = (the equal sign) in the cell you want to return the value to and then clicking the cell in the PivotTable that contains the data you want to return.

arguments.name: PivotTable Analyze
arguments.description: You can turn this feature off by selecting any cell within an existing PivotTable, then go to the PivotTable Analyze tab > PivotTable > Options > Uncheck the Generate GetPivotData option.
